node.title: Explosion in Pakistan kills at least 15 after gas accumulates in sewer beneath bank
node.alt: People and paramilitary personnel clear the rubble after a blast in an industrial area in Karachi.
node.description: Police spokesman Sohail Jokhio says the blast was apparently caused when something ignited gas that had built up in the sewer beneath a bank building in the Shershah neighbourhood ofÂ Karachi.
node.content:
["A powerful gas explosion in a sewage system in Pakistan has\u00a0killed at least 15\u00a0people and injured 16\u00a0others, police and a health official said.", "Karachi government spokesman Murtaza Wahab said in a tweet 15 people had died from the blast.", "Police spokesman Sohail Jokhio said the blast on Saturday was apparently caused when something ignited gas that had accumulated in the sewer beneath a bank building in the Shershah neighbourhood of the port city of Karachi.", "The\u00a0blast occurred\u00a0at a branch of Pakistan's largest bank, Habib Bank Limited, with skeleton staff working over the weekend.", "Video footage aired by local television stations showed the entire structure of the Shershah branch was damaged.", "The floor was blown out and furniture was mired in sewage from below.", "The impact of the blast damaged several cars parked nearby and threw debris onto a petrol station on the other side of the building.", "Mr Jokhio said it was not yet clear what ignited the gas but a team of explosives experts had been summoned to investigate.", "Dr\u00a0Sabir Memon, of\u00a0Trauma Center Karachi, said 13 people\u00a0were wounded, at least three critically.", "He said several injured were sent to the intensive care unit.", "", "
The blast occurred at a branch of Pakistan's largest bank, Habib Bank Limited, with skeleton staff working on Saturday.(AP: Fareed Khan)
", "Senior police officer Sarafar Nawaz Shaikh later said two of the injured died at the hospital raising the death toll to 12.", "Shaikh said investigators were not ruling out the possibility the explosion was the work of militants.", "Witness Mohammad Sameer said he was in the crowded bank branch moments before the blast but left shortly before the explosion.", "He said he rushed back to the damaged bank to rescue victims.", "In statement on Twitter, Habib Bank said the explosion had damaged its branch and caused casualties and injuries.", "\"Our sympathies are with the bereaved families,\" it added.", "", "
Rescue workers move a person injured from the blast\u00a0into an ambulance.(Reuters:\u00a0Akhtar Soomro)
", "A petrol station next to the bank in the Sindh Industrial Trading Estate was also\u00a0reportedly\u00a0damaged.", "Many sewage channels in the city have been covered, mostly illegally, by constructing concrete structures over them.", "Mukhtar Abro, a local administrator, said illegal construction over the sewage area of the explosion was under notice to vacate and the structures were to be demolished.", "Last month, the country\u2019s Supreme Court ordered the demolition of a multi-storey apartment building found to have been constructed on an illegal plot at Karachi\u2019s main thoroughfare.", "AP/Reuters"]
